description: This file defines API service functions for a notes application, including user authentication, note CRUD operations, and configuration handling.

methods.name: apiLogin
methods.description: Performs user login by sending credentials to the API and returns authentication tokens.

methods.name: apiRegister
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password via the API.

methods.name: apiListNotes
methods.description: Fetches a list of notes, optionally filtered by search term or tag.

methods.name: apiGetNote
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID.

methods.name: apiCreateNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided input data.

methods.name: apiUpdateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new data.
